text:
The Mayor's Office of Housing or its successor shall be responsible for monitoring compliance with Regulatory Agreements. 
(Formerly Sec. 66A.24; added by Ord. 100-94, App. 3/11/94; renumbered by Ord. 2-01, File No. 001969, App. 1/12/2001)
(Former Sec. 66A.23 renumbered as Sec. 66A.22 by Ord. 2-01.)

heading.title: 66A
heading.catch_text: MONITORING FOR COMPLIANCE WITH REGULATORY AGREEMENTS.
